name: Simple Meal Planner
description: Simplify Your Meal Planning with NotionA beginner-friendly Notion template designed for effortless meal planning and organization. What's Inside?Single Database Simplicity: This template features only one database, making it incredibly easy to use.Recipe Management: List down your recipes, including methods of preparation and ingredients.Grocery List: Keep track of all the items you need to buy.Cooking Timer: Never overcook or undercook a meal with the built-in timer.Weekly Meal Planning: Plan y
features: Single Database Simplicity:This template features only one database, making it incredibly easy to use.; Recipe Management:List down your recipes, including methods of preparation and ingredients.; Grocery List:Keep track of all the items you need to buy.; Cooking Timer:Never overcook or undercook a meal with the built-in timer.; Weekly Meal Planning:Plan your meals on a weekly basis for better organization.; What's a Notion template?; Will it work if I have Notion's free plan?; How do I get the template?; Can I share it with friends or team members?
